function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate surveillance and monitoring of the population leading to unchecked spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Widespread transmission of diseases, increased deaths, overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementation of extensive surveillance systems, effective communication with citizens, and assurance of data protection and privacy","Technologies":"Smart city solutions, surveillance technologies, data analytics, and communication tools","People":"General population, particularly vulnerable groups","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and technology providers"},{"Description":"Lack of communication and assurance regarding the use of collected data for communal benefit","Impact":"Increased resistance and compliance issues, erosion of trust in public health efforts","Mitigation":"Transparent communication, assurance of data protection, and clear demonstration of communal benefits","Technologies":"Communication tools, data protection measures, and privacy-enhancing technologies","People":"General population, policy makers, and public health officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, technology providers, and policy makers"},{"Description":"Accessibility and affordability issues with smart solutions leading to digital divide","Impact":"Unequal access to disease identification and prevention tools, increased vulnerability of underserved communities","Mitigation":"Investment in accessible smart technology, infrastructure development, and digital literacy programs","Technologies":"Accessible smart city solutions, digital infrastructure, and educational tools","People":"Underserved communities, economically disadvantaged individuals","Owner":"Government, technology providers, and community organizations"}]}
